title: Amid Forecasts of Recession, Bank of England Raises Interest Rates
description: With inflation above 10 percent, the central bank ramped up its fight against price increases even as it predicted a “prolonged” recession.
dc:creator: Eshe Nelson
media:credit: Sam Bush for The New York Times
media:description: The Bank of England, like many of the world’s central banks, has been raising interest rates in the face of the highest inflation in decades.
